rows.label: tlk70000048_01_msg0001
rows.name:
I've had the pleasure of knowing
Adel-sama for a long time now.

rows.label: tlk70000048_01_msg0002
rows.name:
I'm grateful for the kindness he's
shown me.

rows.label: tlk70000048_01_msg0003
rows.name:
But I wish he'd take more time to think
of his own kindness. He does too much
for others and neglects himself.

rows.label: tlk70000048_01_msg0004
rows.name:
No one knows what will happen next,
or where. I want him to value the time
he has with his family above all else.

rows.label: tlk70000048_01_msg0005
rows.name:
Sharing happiness and grief with your
family is especially important in times
of great hardship...
